thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 29 of 288
thread.title: Victoria

author: Victoria
title: Victoria
text: Everything has been fresh and wonderful! I am an inexperienced cook and this has helped me try new things and get new ideas. I will say, however long the meal says it takes to cook may be accurate, however that is with no interruptions. I have two kids so the normal 30 min meals take me an hour because of tending to them. That aside, I will continue to order from Hellofresh my husband and I love it!
